articles.title: Rafael Nadal sends hopeful message on retirement ahead of US Open - Tennis World USA
articles.description: Tennis – Does this mean we’ll see more of Rafael Nadal?
articles.content: After being eliminated from the Cincinnati tournament by Croatian player Borna Coric, Rafael Nadal expressed his sadness triggered by having to leave so soon but also left a hopeful message for next … [+1623 chars]

articles.description: Follow Northern Superchargers vs Manchester Originals, 21st Match, Aug 21, The Hundred Mens Competition 2022 with live Cricket score, ball by ball commentary updates on Cricbuzz
articles.content: 62 Wiese to Russell, 1 run, slower and wider, Russell looks for the heave again, drags it off the toe-end down to long-on. He doesn't seem happy with his bat, wants to change it
